thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 11 of 178
thread.title: Jennifer Lebus

author: Jennifer Lebus
title: Jennifer Lebus
text: We have just used TrustedHousesitters for the first time. The couple who came were fantastic, looking after our dog & home as if they were their own. The website is really easy to use, we had a huge response and were sorry to disappoint some of the volunteers who all looked excellent. On calling our household insurers to check they had no problem with the arrangement, they promptly gave us a refund as the house would not be empty while we were away!
